Key Match Events: USA had several things going against them
India got the job done to book their Super Eights spot
Suryakumar Yadav bailed out India from choppy waters
Suryakumar Yadav got to a 49-ball half-century
Arshdeep Singh had a career-best performance
Post-Match Reflections: India are now through to the Super Eights
USA are still very much masters of their own fate
a win over Ireland, even a washout, will see them through
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was India's fourth game at the venue
Monank Patel, the designated captain, was out injured
Rohit Sharma called correctly and asked USA to bat in seaming conditions
Others: The ball that felled Kohli in the first over was a dream delivery
The ball that got Rohit was somewhat similar
Suryakumar was struggling to hit the ball off the square
Saurabh Netravalkar shelled a chance to hand Suryakumar Yadav a vital life
